backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores and manages four coating type rates (single, double, doubleSagwanpatti, laminate) with update and query functions for each rate.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three quotation-view features (unified pricing table, coating type summary section, PDF export) to their implementing files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated text file containing short summaries of every frontend source file, describing each component's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component managing form/quotation view state, customer info, and door list, composing Header, Footer, CustomerInfoSection, DoorEntryForm, DoorList, QuotationView, and RateManager.
frontend/src/components/CustomerInfoForm: Standalone card form for collecting and validating customer name and mobile number before starting a quotation, with an onSubmit callback.
frontend/src/components/CustomerInfoSect: A form card component that collects customer name and mobile number, rendering two labeled inputs with icons and controlled state via props.
frontend/src/components/CustomKeyboard.t: Fixed-position custom numeric keypad with fraction slash, decimal, backspace, Done button, and a wide spacebar key, designed for door dimension input on mobile.
frontend/src/components/DimensionInput.t: A dimension input component for door height and width that uses a custom on-screen keyboard, supports fractional inch input, and displays catalogue size matching.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryForm.ts: A form component for adding a new door entry by entering dimensions; validates input, maps to catalogue size, and calls a callback to append the door to the list.
frontend/src/components/DoorList.tsx: Renders a scrollable table of added door entries showing actual size, catalogue size, per-coating prices, and square footage, with a delete button per row.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer component displaying the copyright year and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A top-of-page header component displaying the app icon, title 'Door Quotation Calculator', and a short subtitle.
frontend/src/components/QuotationView.ts: A detailed quotation view that builds per-coating pricing blocks from door entries, renders a unified price table, and provides print and WhatsApp share actions.
frontend/src/components/RateManager.tsx: Admin UI component for viewing hard-coded coating rates and updating backend coating rates via a form with coating type selector and rate input.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context including login/logout, identity state, and an AuthClient-backed provider component for ICP-based auth.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching individual and all coating rates from the backend actor, and a mutation hook for updating a coating rate.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind base/components/utilities, CSS custom properties for a warm amber/gold theme (light and dark modes), and utility classes for amber color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/door.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and constants for door dimensions, coating types/labels/rates, and the catalogue of standard door height/width combinations.
frontend/src/utils/dimensionConversion.t: Utility functions for converting door dimensions between inches and fraction strings, parsing fraction/decimal input, and finding the nearest catalogue size using round-up logic.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappFormatter.ts: Formats door coating quotation data into a WhatsApp-ready message string with door details, per-coating line totals, and grand totals by coating type. Returns the message URL-encoded for use in a WhatsApp share link.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius, box shadows, and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state for the Door Coating Quotation app, recording schema version, existing implemented features (unified quotation table, coating summary section, PDF export), and a pending new feature request for quotation format and PDF export.
